coding_practice.title: Valid Anagram
coding_practice.description: Given two strings s and t, return true if t is an anagram of s, and false otherwise.
coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= s.length, t.length <= 5 * 10^4
s and t consist of lowercase English letters.
coding_practice.follow up: What if the inputs contain Unicode characters? How would you adapt your solution to such a case?
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用 Counter 計算 s 和 t 中各字母出現的頻率。
2. 比較兩個 Counter 是否相等，若相等則 t 是 s 的 anagram，否則不是。
